魧魧魧

魧字的基本解释

魧
háng
大贝。
鱼膏。
古书上说的一种尾红体白的鱼。

魧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［háng］
［《廣韻》胡郎切，平唐，匣。］
［《廣韻》古郎切，平唐，見。］
(1)大贝。
(2)。
(3)赤尾白鱼。
(4)哆口鱼。即鳡鱼。
(5)江豚。

魧字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　魧； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1466第06
【唐韻】古郞切【集韻】居郞切，?音岡。【說文】大貝也。【爾雅·釋魚】貝大者魧。【註】書大傳曰：大貝如車渠。車渠謂車輞，魧屬。又【說文】一曰魚膏。又【集韻】【韻會】下朗切【正韻】下黨切，?音沆。義同。又【廣韻】胡郞切【集韻】寒剛切，?音航。魚名。【博雅】魧，魠也。

魧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
魧字的起名意思

暂无。

魧
Basic explanation of words
魧
háng
Dabei.
Fish paste.
A kind of fish with red tail and white tail in ancient books.
魧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［háng］
["Guangyun" Hu Langqie, Ping Tang, Xie. ]
["Guangyun" Gu Langqie, Ping Tang, see you. ]
(1) Dabei.
(2) .
(3) Red tail white fish.
(4) Duokouyu. That is the eel.
(5) Finless porpoise.
魧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　魧; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1466 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Gu Yunqie [Jiyun] Ju Yunqie,? Yingang. [Said the text] Dabei also. 【Erya·Shuyu】The big shellfish is 魧. [Note] The book Da Chuan said: Dabei is like a car canal. The car canal is a car rim, which belongs to the genus Orchid. [Said the text] Yi said fish paste. And [Jiyun] [Rhyme Meeting] and [Zhengyun] and Dangqie,? Yinhan. The same meaning. Also [Guang Yun] Hu Yin cut [Ji Yun] Han Gang cut,? Yin Hang. The name of the fish. [Bo Ya] Yan, Yan also.
魧

魧
Name meaning
Nothing.
háng
сущ.
1) крупная раковина
2) рыбий жир
3) рыбий скелет, рыбьи кости
